channel.title: Client Problem, please help if possible
channel.description: This is a bit of a pathetic question but, I am trying to use Corby Xevolution's client but can't seem to find where I go to add new models, can anyone help me with this? Any help will be greatly appreciated and if you need any more information then please let me know. Thank you :)

item.title: Client Problem, please help if possible
item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd
item.description:
@570fd wrote:

krazy karl:

I’ve got all folders full of .gz files so I really don’t have a clue

Go to client.JAVA hold ctrl + f. Then write models and search where it says model location or sumthing

But corby xevolution is shit i can say better use danny xDD or wait for release…
Btw Valentino’s emotes are screwed…
Skillc ape emotes gfx loads to south only but i fixed and all emotes (i mean normal)
When u press dance it does gs attacking emote so…
I think u understand…

Read full topic

item.description:
@570fd wrote:

Corby has mod.idx model.dat files and in those files are packed models so…
Idk if u want to leech the models off…
try to make a new foder right in client models and add gz files only…

item.title: Client Problem, please help if possible
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I know that I can’t find the model folder is my problem, the closest I have is the following:

J:\Corby Xevolution client\Models <-- doesn’t seem to work

J:\Corby Xevolution client\cache\PreloadingModels <-- doesn’t work again

J:\Corby Xevolution client\anim\Models <-- also doesn’t work
